const {nextui} = require("@nextui-org/react");

/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
module.exports = {
  content: [
    // ...
    "./node_modules/@nextui-org/theme/dist/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {},
  },
  darkMode: "class",
  plugins: [nextui()],
};

// 1. import \`NextUIProvider\` component
import {NextUIProvider} from "@nextui-org/react";

function App() {
  // 2. Wrap NextUIProvider at the root of your app
  return (
    <NextUIProvider>
      <YourApplication />
    </NextUIProvider>
  );
}

const {nextui} = require("@nextui-org/theme");

/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
module.exports = {
  content: [
    // single component styles
    "./node_modules/@nextui-org/theme/dist/components/button.js", 
    // or you can use a glob pattern (multiple component styles)
    './node_modules/@nextui-org/theme/dist/components/(button|snippet|code|input).js'
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {},
  },
  darkMode: "class",
  plugins: [nextui()],
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\guide\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3f143af0-32e8-46e9-af82-8e5c196e2855.mdx",lineNumber:145,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\guide\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3f143af0-32e8-46e9-af82-8e5c196e2855.mdx",lineNumber:145,columnNumber:1},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.h3,{id:"provider-setup-1",children:"Provider Setup"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\guide\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3f143af0-32e8-46e9-af82-8e5c196e2855.mdx",lineNumber:165,columnNumber:1},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["It is essential to add the ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"NextUIProvider"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\guide\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3f143af0-32e8-46e9-af82-8e5c196e2855.mdx",lineNumber:167,columnNumber:28},this)," at the ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"root"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\guide\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3f143af0-32e8-46e9-af82-8e5c196e2855.mdx",lineNumber:167,columnNumber:52},this)," of your application."]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\guide\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3f143af0-32e8-46e9-af82-8e5c196e2855.mdx",lineNumber:167,columnNumber:1},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-jsx",children:`import * as React from "react";
